aboutme.title: About me
aboutme.description: Hello, I am Basti. I am a passionate developer who is constantly learning new technologies to stay up to date. I am always looking for new challenges and new projects that I can implement with my team.

skillset.title: Skills
skillset.description: I am a passionate developer who is constantly learning new technologies to stay up to date. I am always looking for new challenges and new projects that I can implement with my team.

ellpolloloco.title: El Pollo Loco
ellpolloloco.description: El Pollo Loco is a game that can be played through the browser. It was mainly created with Javascript classes and the Canvas API.

join.title: Join
join.description: Join is a business webapp that allows you to create, plan and manage tasks according to the Scrum principle.

pokedex.title: Pokedex
pokedex.description: Pokedex is a webapp that provides information about all Pokémon using the PokeAPI and visualizes it.

contactForm.privacyFirstPart: I have read and agree to the
contactForm.privacySecondPart: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined

general_notes.title: General Notes
general_notes.content: The following notes provide a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website...

responsible_entity.title: Who is responsible for data collection on this website?
responsible_entity.content: Data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator...

methods.title: How do we collect your data?
methods.content: Your data is collected, on the one hand, by you providing it to us...

usage.title: What do we use your data for?
usage.content: Some of the data is collected to ensure the error-free provision of the website...

rights.title: What rights do you have regarding your data?
rights.content: You have the right to receive information about the origin, recipient, and purpose of your stored personal data at any time free of charge...

provider.name: All-Inkl
provider.details: Provider is ALL-INKL.COM - Neue Medien Münnich...

contract.title: Order Processing
contract.content: We have concluded an order processing agreement (AVV) for the use of the aforementioned service...

data_protection.title: Data Protection
data_protection.content: The operators of these pages take the protection of your personal data very seriously...

storage_duration.title: Storage Duration
storage_duration.content: Unless a more specific storage period is specified in this privacy policy...

legal_basis.title: General Information on the Legal Basis of Data Processing on this Website
legal_basis.content: If you have consented to data processing, we process your personal data based on Article 6(1)(a) GDPR...

third_parties.title: Recipients of Personal Data
third_parties.content: As part of our business activities, we work with various external entities...

consent_revocation.title: Revocation of Your Consent to Data Processing
consent_revocation.content: Many data processing operations are only possible with your explicit consent...

objection_rights.title: Right to Object to Data Collection in Special Cases and to Direct Advertising (Article 21 GDPR)
objection_rights.content: IF DATA PROCESSING IS BASED ON ARTICLE 6(1)(E) OR (F) GDPR...

complaint_rights.title: Right to Lodge a Complaint with the Competent Supervisory Authority
complaint_rights.content: In the event of GDPR violations, data subjects have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority...

data_portability.title: Right to Data Portability
data_portability.content: You have the right to have data that we process automatically based on your consent or in fulfillment of a contract handed over to you or a third party in a common, machine-readable format...

data_access.title: Access, Rectification, and Erasure
data_access.content: Within the framework of applicable legal provisions, you have the right to free information about your stored personal data at any time...

processing_restriction.title: Right to Restrict Processing
conditions: If you dispute the accuracy of your stored personal data...
If the processing of your personal data was unlawful...
If we no longer need your personal data, but you need it to assert legal claims...
If you have objected to processing pursuant to Article 21(1) GDPR, a balance must be struck between your and our interests...
